sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' function ProductScreen({match}) { const product = products.find(p => p._id === match.params.id) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"}
) } export default ProductScreen
